00005 DBus::DBus(QObject* parent)
00006     : QObject(parent)
00007 {
00008     QDBusConnection connection = QDBusConnection::sessionBus();
00009     bool status = connection.registerObject(QLatin1String("/main"), this,
00010                                             QDBusConnection::ExportAllContents);
00011     kDebug() << QString(QLatin1String("DBus startup: %1")).arg(status);
00012 }
